attributes.action: consider the role of OFCOM in the failure of the radio stations Planet Rock and The Jazz.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gov't has committed itself to promote Digital Radio in the UK.  Despite this 2 DAB stations (one of which has nearly 600,000 listeners) will close at the end of March.  By allowing this OFCOM has failed in its Government remit.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "consider the role of OFCOM in the failure of the radio stations Planet Rock and The Jazz."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15563.asp

Prime Minister's Office
